p: Bioactive compounds can be obtained in the form of extracts or essential oils. Several extraction processes can be applied, which are directly related to the chemical quality and the concentration of the antioxidant [ 166]. The extraction method’s choice must be carried out according to the extract/essential oil/active compound’s purpose, being phenolic compounds the mostly extracted compounds [ 3]. Several techniques can be used to extract bioactive compounds, such as supercritical extraction, hydrodistillation, distillation, or microwave-assisted extraction.
